about.html:
I like to make things. I am fascinated with the way things work and have been a tinkerer for as long as I can remember. That cool place where technology, design, and creativity intersect is where I like to spend most of my time.

I most recently worked as a full-stack engineer at Beme.

If you'd like to get in touch, email me.

node.html:
I needed real-time subway data for a project I was working on so I created a Node.js library to access the real-time MTA subway train schedule API.

It powers a subway widget in the current version of Mirror and has been downloaded ~2k times via npm.

frontmatter.title: MTA GTFS npm package
frontmatter.description: A Node.js NYC MTA API library.
